name: Light Polymer Demo
description:
Defeat the Guard Robot and collect his engine, but look out for one other enemy on the way! Play until you beat your high score! Taking damage reduces your score, but collecting coins raise it!

Controls w/ Xbox 360 Controller:

Right Click: Sprint

A: Jump

X: Reload (Hold) Only works when you have less than 10 bullets

Y: Equip Rifle

B: Back

Left Trigger: Aim-Down-Sight

Right Trigger: Shoot

Start: Pause

Controls w/ Keyboard:

Left Ctrl: Sprint

Space: Jump

R: Reload (Hold) Only works when you have less than 10 bullets

Q: Equip Rifle

Escape: Back

Right Click: Aim-Down-Sight

Left Click: Shoot

Enter/Return: Pause
